Name: Erika Rojas
Description:
Erika disappeared on 1st April. Her body was found 21 days later partially burned and in a state of decomposition in a vacant lot in the Barrio Industrial Park of the city. A a suspect has been arrested.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Telam, 22.04.2016

https://www.laizquierdadiario.com/Travesticidio-en-Formosa-hallan-el-cuerpo-de-Erika-Rojas-luego-de-20-dias-de-busqueda

Name: Dayana Zarate Bustamante
Description:
Dayana, who owned a business, was killed and robbed by her partner.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Deber, 04.04.2016

Name: Diana Torres Conde
Description:
Diana was found inside her vehicle with stab wounds in the chest and stomach. The police suspects she was taken to her home and killed inside her car.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Diario Intolerancia, 04.04.2016

Name: B. C. Madariaga Hidalgo
Description:
The victim was executed and her body found with the hands tied, gagged, and with a head shot.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Noticaribe, 09.04.2016

Name: Vanessa Ferreira Prestes
Description:
Vanessa was shot dead on the night of Friday 8th April by two men on a motorcycle. At the time she was on the sidewalk of a street between Bento Munhoz da Rocha Neto Avenue and Etuzi Takayama.

According to witnesses, her killers shot her in the face without getting off the bike. She died in hospital.

Vanessa was an LGBT activist and active in the prevention and treatment of STDs, notably HIV and AIDS.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Diario do Estado, 09.04.2016

http://ilhadomelfm.com.br/travesti-e-morto-com-tiro-no-rosto-no-parque-sao-joao/

https://psolpgua.blogspot.com/2016/04/nota-de-repudio-pelo-assassinato-da.html

https://planettransgender.com/more-sad-news-from-brazil-murders-and-beatings/

Name: Shante Thompson
Description:
Shante and her friend Willie Sims were talking with each other when a group of men approached them and started to beat them with crowbars or tire irons.

After beating them, they were shot and left lying where they fell on the ground. Both died at the scene.

> Thompson’s mother said that a group of men in the neighborhood had been confronting her daughter recently. “They kept picking on [her]” she said, “[Shante] was telling me that for a long time, they have been bothering [her] and bothering [her].” She said that losing her child is by far the greatest heartbreak she’s ever faced.

Late the same month Tariq Lackings, 23, was charged with capital murder in connection with the crime.

TvT project: Dallas Voice, 11.04.2016 & Houston Press, 21.04.2016

https://www.advocate.com/crime/2016/4/11/trans-woman-and-friend-killed-houston

https://www.cbsnews.com/news/suspect-in-murder-of-houston-transgender-woman-man-arrested/

https://www.autostraddle.com/shante-thompson-becomes-8th-trans-person-murdered-in-us-so-far-this-year-335155/

https://www.khou.com/article/news/crime/2-beaten-fatally-shot-along-midtown-roadway/285-128331643

Description:

The victim and her cousin were robbed and shot.

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was found on a rural path with hands tied and multiple beating marks over her body.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & HoySanLuis 11.04.2016

Name: Luana Biersack
Description:
Luana's body was found in a minicipal lake in Novo Itacolomi on 22nd April. She had been missing since 13th April.

According to a police witness she was seen with a group of teenagers on the day she went missing, and one of them confessed to having witnessed her murder.

According to the police, one or more of them had sex with her before punching and kicking her. Her head was then held underwater until she drowned.

Her alleged killer Kaio Protzek died on 27th August 2018 of cardiorespiratory arrest while inside a cinema. The local police reported finding large quantities of cocaine in the venue.

Luana's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/luana.biersak. Prior to her disappearance, Luana left a post on her timeline stating that she was being threatened by someone.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Blasting News, 30.04.2016

Name: Alejandra Padilla
Description:
Alejandra was found on the road with multiple beating injuries on the evening of Friday 15th April. She died in hospital at midnight.

Alejandra was an activist with the Trans Feminist Association.

TvT project: Change & ONUSIDA, 22.04.2016

https://www.change.org/p/leonidas-rosa-bautista-embajador-representante-permanente-de-honduras-ante-la-oea-por-favor-tome-en-serio-los-asesinatos-de-activistas-lgbti

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim's body was found with a woman's. Both were executed by a drug dealers' group. They had stabbing and shot wounds.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Letra Roja, 15.04.2016

Name: Jessica Menezes Cavalcante
Description:
Jessica was leaving a bar when she was surrounded by two young men, one of whom stabbed her in the shoulder, armpit, and back. Although wounded, she was able to walk down Jerusalem Avenue before falling on the corner of Thebes Street with Jericho.

A security camera near the site captured footage of the attack. Shortly afterwards Tarley Antônio Nascimento was arrested and confessed to the crime. Authorities claim he stated that he murdered Jéssica because she was transgender.

> Sargeant Teodoro testifies that “The images are clear and he confessed as soon as we arrived at the scene. He also confessed in front of his fathers and stated the motive as trivial, futile: she was transgender, he had previous disagreements and decided to settle the score.

TvT partner organisation Rede Trans Brasil & Uipi, 16.04.2016

http://www.deolhoemaquiraz.com.br/2016/04/familia-de-travesti-morto-facadas-tenta.html

http://planettransgender.com/three-brazilian-trans-girls-murdered-youngest-was-14/

Name: Keyonna Blakeney
Description:
Keyonna was stabbed to death by Keith C. Renier in her room at the Red Roof Inn in Rockville. In August 2017 he was sentenced to 30 years in prison for her murder.

> Keith C. Renier received the maximum sentence for second-degree murder, The Washington Post reports. Judge Marielsa Bernard of Montgomery County Circuit Court in Maryland imposed the sentence Friday.
> 
> Renier accompanied another man who had arranged to meet Blakeney, 22, for a date at the Red Roof Inn in Rockville, Md., in April of last year, but they actually intended to rob her, according to court documents quoted by the Post. Blakeney was found dead of multiple stab wounds April 16, 2016, and her room “appeared to have been ransacked,” the documents said.

TvT project: The Advocate & The Washington Post, 18.04.2016

https://www.advocate.com/crime/2017/8/21/killer-maryland-trans-woman-sentenced-30-years-prison

http://www.washingtonblade.com/2018/01/11/sentence-murder-keyonna-blakeney/

https://www.autostraddle.com/keyonna-blakeney-just-22-becomes-the-latest-black-trans-woman-murdered-in-the-us-335800/

Name: La Gaviota"" Zambrano Godoy
Description:
The victim was approached by four men who, without saying a word, shot her and left her body.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Noticia al Dia, 18.04.2016

Name: Wilmer Jose Bellorin Contreras
Description:
Wilmary was killed by military men who allegedly came at the request of another group of sex workers who had fought inside a bar.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Diario de Guayana, 30.04.2016
